column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I was very underwhelmed by Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  The sangria was good
column2: but that's about the only good thing about the place.  The food was just so-so.  The tomato bread with prosciutto was literally cold
column3: soggy bread slathered with tomato sauce.  The garlic shrimp was just so-so.  Our waitress never came back to check on us despite the fact that the restaurant wasn't really that crowded.  The atmosphere was fun
column4: but the restaurant does not really focus on customer service.  Also
column5: the whole place also had this weird overly potent smell of garlic.
